title: Embedded Systems
description: Design principles, programming techniques, and case studies of embedded real-time systems.  Interface techniques and devices.  Representations and reasoning about physical processes.Credit not awarded for both CS 4220 and CS 6235.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CS 2200 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3057 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3058 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
